column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Raiko says : " Well , she 'll be stepping down tomorrow .
#Text=" Raiko says : " When Kuvira started cleaning up the Earth Kingdom , she knew her position was n't permanent .
#Text=She gave me her word that she 'd step down .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Still , I 'd feel a lot better if Korra were here .
#Text=" Korra says : " You got to help me get back into Avatar fighting shape .
#Text=I 'm getting my butt kicked by losers all over the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=The world needs me .
#Text=" Toph says : " Get over yourself !
#Text=The world does n't need you one bit .
#Text=" Korra says : " But , while I 've been the Avatar , I 've stopped some really bad people from doing some really bad things .
#Text=" Toph says : " Listen , when I was Chief of Police in Republic City , I worked my butt off busting criminals .
#Text=But did that make crime disappear ?
#Text=Nope .
#Text=If there 's one thing I learned on the beat , it 's that the names change , but the street stays the same .
#Text=" Korra says : " So , basically , you 're saying that everything I 've ever accomplished has been pointless .
#Text=And I thought Beifong was grumpy .
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'm the original Beifong !
#Text=" Korra says : " So ... you 're not going to train me ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Well , I was planning on soaking my feet in mud for a few weeks .
#Text=But I ca n't stand you being so pathetic and getting your butt kicked all the time .
#Text=All right , I guess I can help .
#Text=" Korra says : " Thank you !
#Text=" Toph says : " Na - uh - uh - uh .
#Text=You want to hug something , go hug a tree .
#Text=We 're here to work !
#Text="
